summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the functionality of embedding layers, covering mask computation, correctness, sparsity handling, constraint enforcement, low‑rank adaptation (LoRA) activation, quantization strategies, and weight initialization behavior.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and correctness of embedding components in machine‑learning systems, especially when applying masking, sparsity, LoRA, and quantization, to support reliable model deployment and performance.
